entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 09:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ENE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow this morning. Fog patches this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
